channel.title: Game
channel.description: My Halo3 disk won't load the maps and it's a bit scratched. If I take it back to Gamestop will they give me another one if I ask for a exchange I have the receipt and it hasn't been 30 days yet..

item.title: Game
item.dc:creator: @BlazezFire BlazezFire
item.description:
@BlazezFire wrote:

[quote=“cooper, post:10, topic:279502”][quote author=»rezzy. link=topic=368852.msg2802862#msg2802862 date=1243545677]
Toothepaste works for my scratched disks.

Did you use a toothebrush?
Maybe you put it on the wrong way. Did you put it on the brushy side, or the handle side?
Either way, you did it wrong, use the toothepaste as a cleaner thingie. Put it on the disk and like lick it around and shit.
[/quote]

I used to see something called “magic disk cleaner” at blockbuster that claimed you could use it to make scratched disks usable again, maybe try that.[/quote]
Does the Toothpaste trick really work?

Read full topic

item.description:
@cooper wrote:

[quote="»rezzy., post:9, topic:279502"]Toothepaste works for my scratched disks.

Did you use a toothebrush?
Maybe you put it on the wrong way. Did you put it on the brushy side, or the handle side?
Either way, you did it wrong, use the toothepaste as a cleaner thingie. Put it on the disk and like lick it around and shit.[/quote]

I used to see something called “magic disk cleaner” at blockbuster that claimed you could use it to make scratched disks usable again, maybe try that.

item.title: Game
item.dc:creator: @_rezzy »rezzy.
item.description:
@_rezzy wrote:

Toothepaste works for my scratched dicks.

Did you use a toothebrush?
Maybe you put it on the wrong way. Did you put it on the brushy side, or the handle side?
Either way, you did it wrong, use the toothepaste as a cleaner thingie. Put it on the disk and like lick it around and shit.

Read full topic

[quote=“BlazezFire, post:1, topic:279502”]My Halo3 disk won’t load the maps and it’s a bit scratched.
If I take it back to Gamestop will they give me another one if I ask for a exchange I have the receipt and it hasn’t been 30 days yet…[/quote]

Sure they will, they can send it back to the distributor so it won’t cost them either.
